message.content:
1. Isomaltulose did not influence glycemic control assessed as HbA1c in type 2 diabetes.
2. The assessment was conducted under free-living conditions.
3. Isomaltulose was associated with lower triglyceride levels.

messages.content:
Statement: Isomaltulose did not influence glycemic control assessed as HbA1c in type 2 diabetes under free-living conditions but was associated with lower triglyceride levels.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
